definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: taḫaš, a kind of leather or skin, and perh. the animal yielding it (prob. the dugong, cf. Ar. tuxsun dolphin, Thes:1500 Di-Ry:Ex 25:5 Post:Hast. DB BADGER; As. taḫšu (Dl: Baer Ezech. xvi), for which Dl:Proi. 77 ff.; HWB 705 conj. meaning sheep(skin); Bondi:Egyptiaca 1 ff. cp.Egypt. ṯḥš, leather; v. summary of views M’Lean-Shiply:Ency. Bib. BADGERS’ SKINS);—abs. ´[[ת]]: Nu 4:6 +, [[תָּחַשׁ]] v:Nu 4:8 +; pl. [[תְּחָשִׁים]] Ex 25:5 + ;—leather used for (woman’s) sandals Ez Ex 16:10; elsewhere for cover of tabernacle Nu 4:25, ´[[עוֹר ת]]: v:Nu 4:6, v:Nu 4:8, v:Nu 4:10, v:Nu 4:11, v:Nu 4:12, v:Nu 4:14, [[תְּחָשִׁים]]([[הַ]])[[עׂרׂת ]] Ex 25:5, Ex 26:14, Ex 35:7, Ex 35:23, Ex 36:19, Ex 39:34 (all P).
